name: Glide Down
description:
Glide down and guide the balloon to safety!

Move the balloon side to side as it descends from it's flight. Avoid the obstacles while falling to protect the balloon!

Only the best will beat this!

Features include:

- Free to Play!
- 15 levels
- Enjoy the Sunset
- Great Gameplay

Contact us at support@4shogames.com if you have any questions, concerns or comments! We appreciate any and all feedback!
